column3:
‚ÄúMy Aurora Indica was grown from seed in 80/20 Perlite/Vermiculite with an 8 week veg cycle. Each plant was topped once at 4 weeks. 3 plants produced nearly 450g total. Good leaf to bud ratio. Dense bud structure even under a T5. Strong branching required no support. Harvested with cloudy and amber trichomes. Sticky even after months of curing. Gums up a grinder quickly.

With such a generous yield I was able to try c...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is the perfect Indica, spicy taste bordering on an assault on the sense when you smell your fingers after breaking the buds apart, regularly causing sneasing sessions with the sensory overload, nice but not at the same time. Anyway sidetrack (smoking this right now and just drank a cannamilk concoction from 35g of old dry stems so better get this finished before that takes effect), the medicnal properties are st...‚Äù
‚ÄúMy go to medication for sleep. Full body relaxation that leaves the mind clear. Best sleep I've had in a long time.‚Äù

‚ÄúOne of the best weeds I've ever smoked for night time. Incredible blueberry taste with a slight musk, this strain relieves my back and neck pain and also helps my stomach calm down. Time slows and you are sweept away to a nice sleep. Relaxing for your body and mind, followed up by feeling super clean the next day.‚Äù

‚ÄúSimply an outstanding Indica, perhaps one of the greatest. Smooth, fuzzy smoke with a subtle fruity piney taste. Immediately makes the brain feel furry and a good stone comes over you after righteous bong rip. I'm currently growing this myself and hope my harvest turns out as exceptional as this particular flower. Highly recommended.  I will be returning to this strain.‚Äù

‚ÄúVery heavy buzz for first few days until you get used to it!...90% Indica from Nirvana....Dreamy when first smoked...just try to stay awake for a bit until you succumb to the mighty Aurora stream! Peace n Pot -V-‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is the strain I am currently working with in my indoor setup. This plant recovers from well from issues and will on growing as hard as it can. It responds well to both topping and low stress training. To those who like to experiment with defoliation: be prepared to have some some tall plants. The smell is strong, and without proper odor control you could run into some issues if stealth is a concern. I am current...‚Äù

‚ÄúI have 40+ years experience growing and using cannabis, a masters degree in agri/horticulture from MSU and will break each review down as follows from my own personal experience with seeds or clones obtained directly from the original breeders:

I would like to first note that although a very nice strain, my experience was nothing like Nirvana describes and I would describe it as more of a hybrid than an indica domin...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is what I grow to relieve MS-related spasticity, and those I share with love the smell of this and more importantly, its action. This is seriously a nighttime strain, though; an outrageous body high, plus complete relaxation and a fantastic night's sleep.‚Äù

‚ÄúMethod: Glass blunt.  Aurora Indica keeps impressing me more and more.  This was a very fun 10 minute laugh-fest with my little brother and now I'm cruising feeling very good.  I definitely recommend trying this if it's available to you.  Recommended activities: relaxing, talking, hanging out with friends.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain is very good for those who don't like the psychedelic/head high that sometimes gets you paranoid. All you get with Aurora Indica is a pleasant couchlock effect, with your perception staying clear. Sometimes induces retrospective moods. Very good for insomniacs, as it makes me sleep even if I don't really want to. I wouldn't recommend to watch a movie or anything, since you're most likely to fall asleep (a...‚Äù
‚ÄúExcellent for pain and very flavorful buds. It's a potent creeper high, too; you don't feel it coming on till it's there.‚Äù

‚ÄúWowww!! And again wow! Absolutely a great strain.
Great taste great head keep you positive and put you right away for a good night sleep. 

Amazing plantüíú‚Äù

‚ÄúI was having a particularly intense 10 say episode of either severe gastritis or cyclic vomiting (I get this frequently, likely some damage done while addicted to prescription drugs for years and consumed all my tons of pills on exclusively empty stomachs) and was broke and my medical card had expired, thus leaving me extremely ill.

A good friend helped me out and gifted me some 99% CBD Isolate crystals and .5g of s...‚Äù

‚Äúcrop after crop this bad boy has continued to provide consistent results in quality and happiness throughout North East Michigan. This beautiful cross delivers a cerebral effect worthy of a five star rating.‚Äù
‚ÄúA better-than-average indica, with a nice head high in the beginning, creeping to a lazy stone :). Stillnot that strong, I expected stronger based on the parentage (afghan x NL)‚Äù

‚ÄúI was having a particularly intense 10 say episode of either severe gastritis or cyclic vomiting (I get this frequently, likely some damage done while addicted to prescription drugs for years and consumed all my tons of pills on exclusively empty stomachs) and was broke and my medical card had expired, thus leaving me extremely ill.

A good friend helped me out and gifted me some 99% CBD Isolate crystals and .5g of s...‚Äù

‚ÄúWowww!! And again wow! Absolutely a great strain.
Great taste great head keep you positive and put you right away for a good night sleep. 

Amazing plantüíú‚Äù

‚ÄúUsing this for anxiety I will give four stars! The taste is genuine but true to indica form I got really lazy smoking so definitely a night time strain. The high kind of creeps up on you so don't over estimate.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis strain is terribly hard to come by but do not hesitate to pick it up if you're a heavy indica lover. Aurora Indica" is a perfect name for this mystic
column4: delicious strain. It's more of a sweet/berry indica with earthy undertones than a hashy
column5: spicy indica like some can be. The exhale is really fantastic with a clean
column7: and tasteful smoke leaving your lips. It leaves you feeling extremely relaxed with most pa...‚Äù"

column3: ‚ÄúPicked up a cart w/ battery pack was a steal of deal damn this cart was beyond exception thru a vape.Flower guy but damn K.I.N.D w/ combo-ed with Hashishans 5mg B.I.D. in AZ.flavor's popped of Hibicus and Lavender hit's the body w/great buzz and clear head tingle feeling.Great for relaxing and looking for apartment's in Oregon.High lasted for awile 2 hour's maybe more damn the flavor's though hit that spot of a very ...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is one of the/my top 5 Indicas when cultivated correctly. The genetics are untouchable. Two excellent parents. A great smell of sweet and well balanced pine note in there. I went into the dispensary and got lucky and got an eighth and before anyone could get some it sold out because it was lovely, fantastic medicine to use at night to chill and one of the best Indica flowers for insomnia it's been nice to have i...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is a supreme Indica strain that when you cultivate it correctly it is more than rewarding. I have had Aurora in Live Resin before flower and I know that it's a special strain. I really love this strain. Heavy Indicas are what I medicate with so I try so hard to have some good Indica for Insomnia and my lower back pain.‚Äù
‚ÄúNow this is one of my favourite strains! I wish it was Legal :)‚Äù

‚ÄúSmoking this shizzle up right now. 

Had a friend grow this. Didn't yield a lot, first grow. However,it hits nicely, and not too hard at the beginning. There is an everlasting calm about this strain. The best thing about Aurora is the creativity it inspires.. i work like a maniac on this stuff!‚Äù
‚ÄúI personally love this strain. It is perfect for night time, but I use it all day. It definitely helps with my depression and anorexia.‚Äù
‚ÄúLike everyone else this is good for bed time.‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat for sleep‚Äù

‚ÄúDefinitely put me to sleep faster than all the sleep aids I've taken my entire life. 

If you have chronic insomnia, this is definitely the way to go.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is one of the/my top 5 Indicas when cultivated correctly. The genetics are untouchable. Two excellent parents. A great smell of sweet and well balanced pine note in there. I went into the dispensary and got lucky and got an eighth and before anyone could get some it sold out because it was lovely, fantastic medicine to use at night to chill and one of the best Indica flowers for insomnia it's been nice to have i...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is a supreme Indica strain that when you cultivate it correctly it is more than rewarding. I have had Aurora in Live Resin before flower and I know that it's a special strain. I really love this strain. Heavy Indicas are what I medicate with so I try so hard to have some good Indica for Insomnia and my lower back pain.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain let me down with the pheno selection. Very indica dominate structure with an Afghani appearance that produced huge colas with purple hues long pistols long trichomes sticky buds good for hash but mild with its effects. Relax and chill not very intense.  Good for someone who is sensitive to the effects of cannabis. Just not for me.‚Äù

‚ÄúPotent strain for relaxation, meets the criteria of a great couch-locking indica. Full of earthy, peppery smell that is great on the nose. Great flavor, may be described as a shot of cologne in your mouth because flavor and smell explodes once grinded!‚Äù

‚Äúsehr geile Sorte stoned as fuck 
sehr sanft im Geschmack 
gigantische Ernte nach 75 tagen‚Äù
‚Äúdecent strain but definitely not one of my favs.the batch I got is covered in red hairs,but not as strong as I like to see in my indicas.‚Äù
‚ÄúVery floral aroma like a purple rose would smell! Full on body buzz ! great genetics‚Äù
‚ÄúSimply magic. The very best for nighttime relaxation. Almost as good as harvesting this strain and being drunk off of the terpenoids, it's SO powerful and fragrant.‚Äù
‚ÄúOne of the best strands I've come across, and have been able to find it at only one place in Colorado Springs, MC Caregivers.‚Äù

‚ÄúTried the aurora indica capsules and they hit me hard. the first day I tried it and felt great. The second day I wanted to keep the feel good train going so i took another and felt really spacey and not in a good way but it eventually passed and then i felt fine but had some trouble falling asleep. Third day I figured I was good to go and after a capsule I had a panic attack when it hit me. It eventually faded and th...‚Äù

‚Äúpeople swear by this, but you have to get the right pheno and apparently there's loads. tried the (hairy pheno) which wasn't that strong, still a massive long xmas tree center cola and big dense buds with a kinda kush smell when dried and diesel-like whilst flowering.‚Äù
‚ÄúI was surprised, this woke me up. Good bud.‚Äù
‚Äúgreat for a good night's sleep,and that's about all.‚Äù
‚ÄúExcellent! Takes away pain and will boost your focus. Then you everything will stand still for a few. Not a giddy one. Will make you horny. Very low to no munchies.‚Äù

‚ÄúGrew two; one was a short and classic Indica pheno; the other grew much taller while exhibiting sativa-like characteristics but the effects were very similar; typical Indica pain control, muscle spasm control, etc. A truly medicinal cannabis strain. Gonna get more seeds someday.‚Äù

‚ÄúWow! Very potent strain that will hit you hard. Perfect for insomniacs like myself. Also slows the brain down nicely, if you're one of those who is prone to thinking too much & just need a break from your mind, this offers that break & lasts couple of hours!! Am going to go get a bunch more of this before they sell it all. I love it!!!‚Äù
‚ÄúSimply the best sleep aid. Total relaxation of the body and practically no head high".‚Äù"

‚ÄúGrew this strain from Nirvana seeds and in the process of finishing curing now. Got about 2 solid ounces off two plants but I kept them small on purpose. I gotta say that it's amazing and it's not even fully cured yet. I smoked a bit so far and it's got a nice sweet and earthy taste and although it's not super high in t.h.c. (I would guess around 18%) it has amazing indica qualities and is a wonder for my back pain. ...‚Äù
‚Äúso beautiful‚Äù
‚ÄúPerfect night time strain, helps me sleep so much better and is great for listening to some psychedelic jams.‚Äù
‚ÄúVery nice and mellow‚Äù
‚Äúthis is a great strain for evenings. very relaxing and calming.‚Äù
‚ÄúIncredible strain, one of the best I've smoked. It has a really nice pineapple smell, a bitter sweet flavour and realli nice relaxing effects‚Äù

‚ÄúA fellow pothead friend of mine grew this in his closet, super sketchy setup which only yielded about 20g per plant. 

However, the smoke was fekkin smooth. Didn't hit too hard, a nice mellow hit at first but then I got super busy on it. Some stuff I did whilst baked on this: 
- Cleaned. A LOT
- Danced around the apartment
- Had pretty good sex

... but the best thing about this strain, is that it's a pure head high....‚Äù

‚ÄúA new addition to my menu, this stuff is knockout good night, crack up an hour or so at the tv, then snoring next. It has a real lung expanding harsh hit, no feelings after 3 to 4 hits, then 5 minutes later the effects start and it is really heavy duty. A true creeper, and one that I will recommend to my patients looking for relief from pain and also needing a good night's sleep.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is the one I always come back to. Super easy to grow, only 7 weeks to flower completely. Powerful, long-lasting couch-lock Indica effect. The best I've found for PTSD related insomnia.‚Äù
‚Äúgood high‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is not only an excellent Indica strain it is also the smoothest smoke I have ever had. 
First pic üòé‚Äù
‚ÄúIt has a nice relaxing effect on the body. If your anxiety is high, you just need to hit it once or twice. If you do it anymore, you'll get sleepy. It has a nice cinnamon taste to it.‚Äù

‚ÄúEasy to grow. Our pgenotype smelled like Hawaiian Punch to a T. Fruity, earthy exhale but smooth after just a couple of weeks in a jar.
Handles LST/HST well. Fim topped and scrogged she supported her buds well but needed some extra care at the end. Great for what it is, and ours was as close to pure Indica as I've ever had. Great for contentment, sleep, relaxation but not as euphoric as I had hoped.
Heavy resin produ...‚Äù
‚ÄúSmells and looks incredible. An absolute pleasure to grow and responds well to plant training and SOG techniques. Great bud structure and a definite couch lock strain.‚Äù
‚ÄúFor me it wasnt a bad strain. Typical indica. Made me lazy and introspective. If you wanna just sit back and zone out and chill, its for you.‚Äù
‚ÄúIÔ∏è love this strain. Very specific body high. I frequently get anxiety with weed but this hits in the background. It‚Äôs all body high and stress relief/zoning out. Beautiful strain.‚Äù

‚ÄúFinishing curing now after growing two girls this year. Two solid ounces as I kept the plants small. I chose this strain because of the heavy indica qualities and it's exactly like people say. A nice and euphoric high that melts into couch lock and a great muscle relaxer. Tastes like sweet earth and lavender. very pleased with this strain and the buds are a olive green with tinges of purple and super red hairs covere...‚Äù

‚ÄúVery flavorful, deep and rich across the tip of the tongue with a slightly tingling exhalation. Bag smell was wonderful. Burn was even better.  Piney fragrance that quickly dissipates.  A brief flash of euphoria followed by a total body relaxation that presents you with the option of slumber or stimulating conversation with others.  All pain in the body is dispatched for 2+ hours.  I doubled down on this strain as it...‚Äù
‚Äúgreat strain easy to grow with a great stritch will grow again for sure‚Äù
‚Äúbeyond couch lock! great strain for sleeping..‚Äù
‚Äúgets the job done grows great medium yields‚Äù

‚ÄúMethod of Intake: Glass Blunt.  Aurora Indica, like it's name suggests, takes you on a soft creative ride through light, time, and space.  Recommended activities:  composing music, painting/drawing, watching an awesome movie, laying down.  No Sweat.‚Äù

‚ÄúI smoked one joint of this and while the effects were not as strong as I expected, the relaxation provided was very intense and quite pleasurable. Great for stress; all my worries disappeared completely. There was no euphoria. It enhanced my appetite and overall enjoyment of food pretty significantly. While far from my favorite, it's a nice, mellow indica.‚Äù

‚ÄúI really like my Aurora Indica. I have a local company that makes live resin cartridges of Aurora and it's nice. I just got an eighth of flower this afternoon and I am enjoying it too the fullest.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis has became a go to strain for a Heavy Indica lover as myself. Effects are relaxation after dinner, and the best effect is sleep. Then when I get up at 4:15 a.m. to let the cats out it will lull me back to sleep. Just the genetics alone should tell you that you are not going to be disappointed with parents like Afghani & N.L. gotta keep some of this on hand in the Cookies container!‚Äù
‚ÄúCouch lock!‚Äù

‚ÄúI have 40+ years experience growing and using cannabis, a masters degree in agri/horticulture from MSU and will break each review down as follows from my own personal experience with seeds or clones obtained directly from the original breeders:

I would like to first note that although a very nice strain, my experience was nothing like Nirvana describes and I would describe it as more of a hybrid than an indica domin...‚Äù

‚ÄúHave grown (outdoor) and smoked it back in 2008.
Very potent strain from Nirvana seeds.
Made around 120g from one plant. 
Anyway, I remember that the high isn't the strongest, THC levels must be under 18%.
High is uplifting, with a couch-lock effect but with the ability of staying concentrated. Good for some artistic stuff as another member mentioned.
One of my favorite strains. Haven't really tasted anything so spic...‚Äù
‚ÄúAbsolutely Amazing. Took me on a journey I will never forget. I wish I could share but a lot of people would be at risk.‚Äù
‚ÄúIm growing for now. Will see it‚Äù
‚ÄúHate the taste.. will get you body high‚Äù
